and wu.`realname` like concat('%',#{parameter.userName},'%')

SELECT sq.`id` questionId, sqa.`survey_id`, sq.`title` questionName, sq.`type`questionType, COUNT(sqa.`user_id`) count FROM `material_survey_question_answer` sqa JOIN `material_survey_question` sq ON sqa.`question_id` = sq.`id`
sq.`type` IN (4,5)
AND sqa.`survey_id` = #{surveyId}
GROUP BY sq.`title` ORDER BY sq.`sort`
